item.title: By: Jim
item.dc:creator: Jim
item.description:
Sapana,
could you provide code examples? I have it mostly figured out, but I don't know where to fetch ScheduleID from. It doesn't generate from the CreateSubscription Stored procedure, but it is required to run AddReportSchedule.
item.content:encoded:
Sapana,

could you provide code examples? I have it mostly figured out, but I don’t know where to fetch ScheduleID from. It doesn’t generate from the CreateSubscription Stored procedure, but it is required to run AddReportSchedule.

item.title: By: Sapana
item.dc:creator: Sapana
item.description:
Hello Guys, Recently made a custom procedure with the use of 2 procedures CreateSubscription and AddReportSchedule everything works fine we dont need to use
CreateTimeBasedSubscriptionSchedule 3. msdb.dbo.sp_add_job 4. msdb.dbo.sp_add_jobserver 5. msdb.dbo.sp_add_jobstep 6. msdb.dbo.sp_add_jobschedule
Also if we create the schedule using front end then we just ned to use the schedule id in the createsubscription procedure call instead on writing whole big string.
Do let me know if you need any more help on this. Thanks!
item.content:encoded:
Hello Guys,
Recently made a custom procedure with the use of 2 procedures
CreateSubscription and AddReportSchedule everything works fine we dont need to use

CreateTimeBasedSubscriptionSchedule
3. msdb.dbo.sp_add_job
4. msdb.dbo.sp_add_jobserver
5. msdb.dbo.sp_add_jobstep
6. msdb.dbo.sp_add_jobschedule

Also if we create the schedule using front end then we just ned to use the schedule id in the createsubscription procedure call instead on writing whole big string.

Do let me know if you need any more help on this.
Thanks!

item.title: By: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.dc:creator: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.description: Hey, thanks Rafal. You are absolutely correct. I failed to add in this blog the SQL Agent jobs that are linked to the subscriptions. Glad you pointed it out and posted it. :)
item.content:encoded: Hey, thanks Rafal. You are absolutely correct. I failed to add in this blog the SQL Agent jobs that are linked to the subscriptions. Glad you pointed it out and posted it. ðŸ™‚
